thought: To craft purple_carpet, I need to put two pieces of purple_wool side-by-side in the crafting table. There are currently two purple_wools in slot 35, so I'll move one of them to slot 1.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
